import React from 'react' import './index.css' import { Typography, Button } from '@mui/material' const tasks = [ { no: 1, dateTime: "2025-03-17 10:30 AM", task: "Fix Bugs", description: "Fix login page validation issues", action: ':', }, { no: 2, dateTime: "2025-03-18 03:00 PM", task: "Meeting with Client", description: "Discuss project requirements", action: ':', }, { no: 3, dateTime: "2025-03-19 11:45 AM", task: "Code Review", description: "Review PR for Task Manager API", action: ':', } ]; console.log(tasks); const TaskManager = () => { return (
Tasks Management
No Date & Time Task Description Action
    {tasks.map((each) => { return
  • {each.no} {each.dateTime} {each.task} {each.description} {each.action}
    • })}
) } export default TaskManager
